Title: Permits the state and local municipalities to purchase from sources other than the correctional industries program of the department of corrections and community supervision
Summary: Permits the state and local municipalities to purchase from sources other than the correctional industries program of the department of corrections and community supervision.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to permitting the state and local municipalities to purchase from sources other than the correctional industries program of the department of corrections and community supervision
